body:
Ian Tester wrote:

Thanks, Ian!

I'd say it's probably easier to just load your modules (of course, I
haven't looked at Perl in a while but I *believe* it's as easy as adding
Python modules (?)).  But as the author of the program, you pretty much
get to do whatever you wish. ;-)

Nice...

- Rob
subject: [Radiance-general] Area lights breaking up?
